verses.text: And \add when\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Arad|strong="H6166"\w* the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* tell that \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w spies|strong="H0871"\w*; then he \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w took|strong="H7617"\w* \add some\add* of them \w prisoners|strong="H7628"\w*.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou wilt \w indeed|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* into my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, then I will utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and delivered \w up|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*; and they utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* them and their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*.\f + \fr 21.3 \ft Hormah: that is, Utter destruction\f*

¶ And they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, to \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*: and the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* was much \w discouraged|strong="H7114"\w* because of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 21.4 \ft discouraged: or, grieved: Heb. shortened\f*

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Wherefore have ye brought us \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*? for \add there is\add* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, neither \add is there any\add* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; and our \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w loatheth|strong="H6973"\w* this \w light|strong="H7052"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w fiery|strong="H8314"\w* \w serpents|strong="H5175"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they \w bit|strong="H5391"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ Therefore the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, for we have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and against thee; \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that he take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w serpents|strong="H5175"\w* from us. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* thee a fiery \w serpent|strong="H8314"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* it upon a \w pole|strong="H5251"\w*: and it shall come to pass, that every one that is \w bitten|strong="H5391"\w*, when he \w looketh|strong="H7200"\w* upon it, shall \w live|strong="H2425"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* it upon a \w pole|strong="H5251"\w*, and it came to pass, that if a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* had \w bitten|strong="H5391"\w* any \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, when he \w beheld|strong="H5027"\w* the \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, he \w lived|strong="H2425"\w*.
¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Oboth|strong="H0088"\w*.

And they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Oboth|strong="H0088"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* at \w Ije-abarim|strong="H5863"\w*, in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* which \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, toward the \w sunrising|strong="H4217"\w*.\f + \fr 21.11 \ft Ije-abarim: or, heaps of Abarim\f*
¶ From thence they \w removed|strong="H5265"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Zared|strong="H2218"\w*.

From thence they \w removed|strong="H5265"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* that cometh \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*: for \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* \add is\add* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, between \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*.

Wherefore it is \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w wars|strong="H4421"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, What he \w did|strong="H2052"\w* in the Red \w sea|strong="H5492"\w*, and in the \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*,\f + \fr 21.14 \ft What…: or, Vaheb in Suphah\f*

And at the \w stream|strong="H0793"\w* of the \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w* that goeth \w down|strong="H5186"\w* to the \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w*, and \w lieth|strong="H8172"\w* upon the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.\f + \fr 21.15 \ft lieth: Heb. leaneth\f*

And from thence \add they went\add* to \w Beer|strong="H0876"\w*: that \add is\add* the \w well|strong="H0875"\w* whereof the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

¶ Then \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sang|strong="H7891"\w* this \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, Spring \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, O \w well|strong="H0875"\w*; \w sing|strong="H6030"\w* ye unto it:\f + \fr 21.17 \ft Spring…: Heb. Ascend\f*\f + \fr 21.17 \ft sing: or, answer\f*

The \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w digged|strong="H2658"\w* the \w well|strong="H0875"\w*, the \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w digged|strong="H3738"\w* it, by \add the direction of\add* the \w lawgiver|strong="H2710"\w*, with their \w staves|strong="H4938"\w*. And from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \add they went\add* to \w Mattanah|strong="H4980"\w*:
And from \w Mattanah|strong="H4980"\w* to \w Nahaliel|strong="H5160"\w*: and from \w Nahaliel|strong="H5160"\w* to \w Bamoth|strong="H1120"\w*:

And from \w Bamoth|strong="H1120"\w* \add in\add* the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, that \add is\add* in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, to the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Pisgah|strong="H6449"\w*, which \w looketh|strong="H8259"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*.\f + \fr 21.20 \ft country: Heb. field\f*\f + \fr 21.20 \ft Pisgah: or, the hill\f*\f + \fr 21.20 \ft Jeshimon: or, the wilderness\f*

¶ And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Let me \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: we will not \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* into the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, or into the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*; we will not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \add of\add* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w well|strong="H0875"\w*: \add but\add* we will go \w along|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \add high\add* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, until we be \w past|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

And \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* would not \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through his \w border|strong="H1366"\w*: but \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: and he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* from \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* unto \w Jabbok|strong="H2999"\w*, even unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*: for the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \add was\add* \w strong|strong="H5794"\w*.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and in all the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 21.25 \ft villages: Heb. daughters\f*

For \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \add was\add* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, who had \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* all his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, even unto \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*.

Wherefore they that speak in \w proverbs|strong="H4911"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, let the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* be \w built|strong="H1129"\w* and \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*:

For there is a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, a \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* from the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w*: it hath \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \add and\add* the lords of the high \w places|strong="H1181"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* to thee, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*! thou art \w undone|strong="H0006"\w*, O \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w*: he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w*, and his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, into \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* unto \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*.

We have \w shot|strong="H3384"\w* at them; \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* is \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* even unto \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, and we have laid them \w waste|strong="H8074"\w* even unto \w Nophah|strong="H5302"\w*, which \add reacheth\add* unto \w Medeba|strong="H4311"\w*.
¶ Thus \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to spy \w out|strong="H7270"\w* \w Jaazer|strong="H3270"\w*, and they \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, and drove \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* that \add were\add* there.

¶ And they \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*: and \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* them, he, and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* at \w Edrei|strong="H0154"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* him not: for I have \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* him into thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to him as thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*.

So they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, until there was \w none|strong="H1115"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* him \w alive|strong="H8300"\w*: and they \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
